name: Purrfect Paint
description:
Some will try to dethrone this kitty as king of the internet, but you got paint to stop them all before they get to the gates!

Shoot rainbow paint in this fast arcade game.

 Controls: 

  • Press 1 to select Yellow, 
  • Press 2 to select Cyan
  • Press 3 to select Magenta
  • Combine two of this Keys to create more Colors
  • Mouse to aim and left click to shoot

Developed by @whiestar and @laucalle in three days. It was an assignment for Master's in Game Design about frustrating design.

Music from Heatly Bros on YouTube, sound effects from YouTube audio library.
